text: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّيْتُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ فَلَوْلَا فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَرَحْمَتُهُۥ لَكُنتُم مِّنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ

translation.en.sahih: Then you turned away after that. And if not for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy, you would have been among the losers.
translation.id.indonesian: Kemudian kamu berpaling setelah (adanya perjanjian) itu, maka kalau tidak ada karunia Allah dan rahmat-Nya atasmu, niscaya kamu tergolong orang yang rugi.
